mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mail_auth (target_email, code, expired_date, auth_yn) VALUES (#{email}, #{code}, NOW() + INTERVAL 5 MINUTE, 'N');
mapper.select: SELECT CODE FROM MAIL_AUTH WHERE TARGET_EMAIL = #{email} ORDER BY expired_date DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE mail_auth set auth_yn = 'Y' where target_email = #{email} and code = #{code}
